dialogue.speaker: A Boy
dialogue.text:
Please, open your eyes!
Hurry up, or something bad will happen!
Come on, come on, come on... Help ――!

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text:
The ringing voice of a boy who knocks you up in a dream.
Your consciousness springs to mind at the urgent voice.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text:
The place where the you opened your eyes was the entrance of an unfamiliar mansion. You are wearing your clothes, but you have nothing in his possession. And you don't know why you're here. You went into bed last night, and when you opened your eyes, you were here.

You don't see the boy who talked to you in your dream.
